RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBoxItem

RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBoxItem Class Reference

#include <listboxitem.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The base class of all ListBoxItem.

An item of a ListBox.

RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBoxItem::ListBoxItem (  ) 

The default constructor.

Definition at line 62 of file listboxitem.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Terminal::ListBoxItem::toggle (  ) 

Toggle the checked value.

If checked was true before the call, it will be false. If it was false, it will be true.
